description.lang: Aeon Labs Garage Door Controller is a smart and wireless Garage Door Control system, you can control the garage door to open, close, or stop moving via wireless signal on your gateway client or phone application.

inclusionNote.lang: Turn the primary controller of Z-Wave network into inclusion mode, short press the product’s Z-Wave button that you can find on the product's housing.

description.lang: Group 1 is assigned to the Lifeline association group and every device has 5 nodes to associate. When the Garage Door controller is received the commands sent by controller to be turned on or off, the Garage Door controller will send a basic report of its status to the nodes in association group 1. To change what kind of signal is sent to the nodes in group 1, please see the detailed description of configuration parameter 80.
When the Garage Door Controller receives the Basic Set, Switch Binary Set,commands from main controller. it will forward the Basic Set, Switch Binary Set to associated nodes in Group 2.
Configure the default startup ringtone.
Disable the startup ringtone.
Enable and select a startup ringtone for the Garage Door Controller.

Calibration Steps: 1. Let the garage door move to full close position. 2. Send this parameter (0x22) with “value=1” to Garage Door Controller. 3. Let the garage door move to full open position. 4. Let the garage door move to full close position after the step 3 is completed. After the step 4 is complete, all calibration steps are complete.
Enable calibration.
Set the timeout of all calibration steps for the Sensor.
Set the timeout of calibration.
Get the numbers of alarm music.(not support Set CC)
Get the number of alarm music.

Configure the alarm mode for when the garage door is opening. Value1: configure the frequency of blinking for the Alarm LED, there are 10 levels that 1 to10 level, the minimum frequency is level 1 and the max frequency is level 10. Default is level 10. Value2: configure the alarm sound (there are 4 types sound saved in EEPROM and user also can update it). Default is type 1. Value3: configure the volume of alarm sound (there are 10 levels, the min volume is 1 level and the max volume is 10 levels). Default is set to 8. Value4=0, disable the alarm prompt. Value4=1, enable the alarm prompt.
Configure the flash frequency of the alarm LED, there are 10 levels can be set.
Select an alarm sound, there are 4 alarm sounds in the flash memory card can be selected.
Configure the volume of alarm sound, there are 10 levels can be set.
Disable the alarm mode.
Enable the alarm mode.

Configure the alarm mode when the garage door is closing. Value1: configure the frequency of blinking for the Alarm LED, there are 10 levels that 1 to10 level, the minimum frequency is level 1 and the max frequency is level 10. Default is level 6. Value2: configure the alarm sound (there are 4 types sound saved in EEPROM and user also can update it). Default is type 2. Value3: configure the volume of alarm sound (there are 10 levels, the min volume is 1 level and the max volume is 10 levels). Default is set to 8. Value4=0, disable the alarm prompt. Value4=1, enable the alarm prompt.
Configure the flash frequency of the alarm LED, there are 10 levels can be set.
Select an alarm sound, there are 4 alarm sounds in the flash memory card can be selected.
Configure the volume of alarm sound, there are 10 levels can be set.
Disable the alarm mode.
Enable the alarm mode.

Configuration alarm mode when the garage door is in "Unknown" state: Value1: configure the frequency of blinking for the Alarm LED, there are 10 levels that 1 to10 level, the minimum frequency is level 1 and the max frequency is level 10. Default is level 4. Value2: configure the alarm sound (there are 4 types sound saved in EEPROM and user also can update it). Default is type 3. Value3: configure the volume of alarm sound (there are 10 levels, the min volume is 1 level and the max volume is 10 levels). Default is set to 8. Value4=0, disable the alarm prompt. Value4=1, enable the alarm prompt.
Configure the flash frequency of the alarm LED, there are 10 levels can be set.
Select an alarm sound, there are 4 alarm sounds in the flash memory card can be selected.
Configure the volume of alarm sound, there are 10 levels can be set.
Disable the alarm mode.
Enable the alarm mode.

Configure the alarm mode when the garage door is in closed position. Value1: configure the frequency of blinking for the Alarm LED, there are 10 levels that 1 to10 level, the minimum frequency is level 1 and the max frequency is level 10. Default is level 2. Value2: configure the alarm sound (there are 4 types sound saved in EEPROM and user also can update it). Default is type 4. Value3: configure the volume of alarm sound (there are 10 levels, the min volume is 1 level and the max volume is 10 levels). Default is set to 8. Value4=0, disable the alarm prompt. Value4=1, enable the alarm prompt.
Configure the flash frequency of the alarm LED, there are 10 levels can be set.
Select an alarm sound, there are 4 alarm sounds in the flash memory card can be selected.
Configure the volume of alarm sound, there are 10 levels can be set.
Disable the alarm mode.
Enable the alarm mode.
Configuration report for the tamper switch State.
The Sensor is installed on the garage door.
The Sensor is removed from the garage door.
Configuration report for the battery state of Sensor.
Battery is in normal state.
Battery is in low battery state.
Start playing or Stop playing the ringtone.
stop playing ringtone
Start playing the ringtone that you selected.
Test the volume of the current ringtone.
There are 10 volume levels can be set for testing.
Get the environment temperature: The temperature value contains one decimal point. E.g. If the report value=252(0x00FC), the temperature is 25.2℃. Rang is 0 to 500 (0 to 50.0℃).
Define the function of Button- and Button+.

Pressing it once, the Button+ and Button- are defined to be used to increase and decrease the volume. Press and hold it, the Button+ and Button- are defined to be the control item of Next and Previous.

Pressing it once, the Button+ and Button- are defined to be the control item of Next and Previous. Press and hold it, the Button+ and Button- are defined to be used to increase and decrease the volume.
Enable/Disable to send notifications to associated devices.
Send Nothing (Disabled)
Send HAIL Command
Send BARRIER OPERATOR Report Command

name.lang: Pair Sensor with Garage Door Controller

description.lang:
Send Configuration Set: Value=0x55555501, which will trigger to start the pairing of Sensor (installed on the top of the garage door), at this time, the Network LED on the Garage Door Controller will blink slowly and then short press Temper Switch back of the Sensor. If pairing is successful, the Network LED will stop blinking and the Garage Door Controller will send the configuration report with value=0x01FF to primary controller/gateway. Otherwise, repeat the operation. Note: 1. If you do not press the Temper Switch when starting the pairing mode, the pairing status will keep for 8 second and - 4 9
then exit the pairing status automatically. 2. The Sensor has been paired with the Garage Door Controller after factory.
Start the Sensor pairing mode.
Enable/Disable Lock Configuration
All configuration parameters are configurable.
All configuration parameters are not configurable (Locked).
Reset all configuration parameters to default setting.
Reset the product to default factory setting and be excluded from the Z-wave network.
